long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
Prevent annoying ads and pop-ups from ruining your online experience. Block ads across YouTube, Facebook, Twitch, and all your favorite websites.

SBlock provides an uninterrupted and smooth web surfing experience with a robust ad-blocking engine that blocks all disrupting ads. Enjoy watching videos, connecting with friends through social media, and checking out your favorite news website without being interrupted by unskippable video promotions, pop-ups, and other distracting ads. 

SBlock features and abilities:
Stops disruptive pop-up, video, banner and other ads from hurting your online experience across YouTube, Facebook, Twitch, and your favorite websites
Blocks third-party trackers to minimize your online footprint
Lets you adjust the ad-blocking intensity for any website based on your preference

All you need to do is click on “Add to Chrome” and SBlock will be automatically downloaded and installed on your browser.

Enjoy smooth and ad-free surfing!
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,pt_BR,pt_PT:
SBlock: The Most Reliable Ad Blocker for YouTube and More!

With exclusive scripts for YouTube, Twitch, LinkedIn, Reddit, Pinterest, and 100+ other websites.

Thank you for choosing SBlock! ❤️ We’re proud to announce that new version is now live and working 100% on YouTube. After testing other ad blockers like AdGuard, uBlock Origin, and Adblock Plus, we can confidently say SBlock is currently the only ad blocker that fully removes YouTube ads.

Why SBlock Stands Out:
Unlike other ad blockers, SBlock uses exclusive, regularly updated scripts to ensure ad-free browsing on popular sites, including YouTube, Twitch, LinkedIn, and more. We’re even developing a new script to block Facebook ads, which is the last major platform with ads we’re working to remove.

Challenges We Face and How You Can Help:
Recently, Google made changes to YouTube that affected SBlock’s functionality. We released a fix in less than an hour, but due to extended review times by Google, it took 7 days to get new version approved. This delay led to over 50,000 uninstalls and many negative reviews. Google’s lengthy review times pose a challenge, but we’re committed to keeping SBlock running smoothly for you, free of charge.

All we ask in return is your support and patience. Instead of uninstalling or leaving low ratings during these periods, please know we’re always working to restore full functionality as quickly as possible. Your support helps us continue providing a free, effective ad blocker that you can rely on!

Thank you for being part of the SBlock community, and enjoy ad-free browsing!
